message: Starting analysis of Weeks 5-6 content (Memory and Perception). Reading PDF text files from pdf-text-extracted directory.
Successfully read both Memory and Perception PDF text files. Beginning systematic extraction of key concepts, theories, and learning objectives.
Created comprehensive structured summary document (weeks_5_6_content_analysis.md) with all key concepts, theories, researchers, and examples. Now reporting additional findings.

Analysis complete. Created comprehensive document with 39+ key concepts (20 Memory, 19 Perception), 20+ researchers/studies, 15+ practical examples, all learning objectives identified. Document saved to workspace. Ready to complete.

COMPLETED: Weeks 5-6 content analysis finished. Deliverables: (1) Comprehensive structured summary document 'weeks_5_6_content_analysis.md' saved to workspace, (2) Extracted 39+ key concepts (20 Memory + 19 Perception), (3) Identified all learning objectives for both topics, (4) Documented 20+ researchers/studies with years, (5) 15+ practical examples suitable for quiz generation, (6) Detailed comparison tables (MSM vs WMM, Gregory vs Gibson), (7) Quiz-ready content with 60+ potential questions. Memory topics: encoding/storage/retrieval, MSM, WMM, LOP, episodic/semantic/procedural memory, forgetting theories. Perception topics: Gestalt principles (6), depth cues (9), constancy types (5), illusions (5), three theoretical approaches. All findings reported via MCP tools. Work verified and academically accurate.
